Package il.ac.hit.CashFlowManagement.viewmodel

Interface IViewModel

All Known Implementing Classes:
ManagementViewModel
public interface IViewModel
this interface define the operations that each Form/Frame must implement

  • Method Details

    • startProgram

      void startProgram()
      add viewModel to all forms and Show the dialog of the LoginForm

    • verifyUser

      boolean verifyUser​(@NotNull @NotNull java.lang.String iUserName, @NotNull @NotNull java.lang.String iPassword)
      The method verifies that the login information (username and password) is correct
      Parameters:
      iUserName - the username of the user who want to login, can't be null
      iPassword - the password of the user who want to login, can't be null
      Returns:
      true either false if the login information correct

    • register

      boolean register​(@NotNull @NotNull java.lang.String iUserName, @NotNull @NotNull java.lang.String iPassword, @NotNull @NotNull java.lang.String iCountry, @NotNull @NotNull java.lang.String iGander)
      The method check if the user exist and if not created a new user
      Parameters:
      iUserName - the new user username, can't be null
      iPassword - the new user password, can't be null
      iCountry - the new user country, can't be null
      iGander - the new user gander, can't be null
      Returns:
      true if new user registered or false if the user already exists

    • addNewExpense

      void addNewExpense() throws FormCastingException
      Add a new expense to the data base
      Throws:
      FormCastingException - if failed to add new expense because of IForm to MainForm casting problem or parse from cost which is not double

    • showMainForm

      void showMainForm()
      Show the dialog of the MainForm

    • showRegisterForm

      void showRegisterForm()
      Show the dialog of the RegisterForm

    • showLoginForm

      void showLoginForm()
      Show the dialog of the LoginForm

    • getAllExpenses

      java.sql.ResultSet getAllExpenses() throws GetAllUserExpensesException
      get all rhe expenses of a specific user
      Returns:
      Result set that represent the table with all the expenses of a specific user
      Throws:
      GetAllUserExpensesException - if there is a problem in getting the information
